title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 150 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 150 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Praise ye the LORD. Praise God in his sanctuary: praise him in the firmament of his power.
lineList.cn: 你们要赞美耶和华，在神的圣所赞美他，在他显能力的穹苍赞美他。

lineList.en: Praise him for his mighty acts: praise him according to his excellent greatness.
lineList.cn: 要因他大能的作为赞美他，按着他极美的大德赞美他。

lineList.en: Praise him with the sound of the trumpet: praise him with the psaltery and harp.
lineList.cn: 要用角声赞美他，鼓瑟弹琴赞美他。

lineList.en: Praise him with the timbrel and dance: praise him with stringed instruments and organs.
lineList.cn: 击鼓跳舞赞美他，用丝弦的乐器，和箫的声音赞美他。

lineList.en: Praise him upon the loud cymbals: praise him upon the high sounding cymbals.
lineList.cn: 用大响的钹赞美他，用高声的钹赞美他。

lineList.en: Let every thing that hath breath praise the LORD. Praise ye the LORD.
lineList.cn: 凡有气息的，都要赞美耶和华。你们要赞美耶和华。
